name: Mad Racers RPG
description:
This is a RPG tabletop game based in post apocalyptic car racing world, where the players will fight each other and story opponents. 

The theme of the game is heavily inspired by Mad Max. 

This was my first ever design for a tabletop RPG, errors may show up but the GM can adjust any values and swap any settings if needed for balancing or to spice up the game. 

The quest given in the files contain around 1 to 2 hours of gameplay, this quest is incomplete but can be built onto, the GM can also create his own quest with the game mechanics.
